channel.title: LTC to MTC translation
channel.description:
Hey there, I got stuck on a project I am working on, and maybe some of you guys encountered the same problem. I'm reading an LTC signal from the audio input, and I need to output the same timecode converted as MTC. I can't find a way to encode it in a format suitable for an MTC output: am I missing something?
thanks!
